description: Table T(n,k), n>=0 and k>=0, read by antidiagonals: the k-th column given by the k-th Narayana polynomial.
comments: Mirror image of A243631. - _Philippe Deléham_, Sep 26 2014
links: H. Prodinger, On a functional difference equation of Runyon, Morrison, Carlitz, and Riordan, arXiv:math/0103149 [math.CO], 2001.
H. Prodinger, On a functional difference equation of Runyon, Morrison, Carlitz, and Riordan, Séminaire Lotharingien de Combinatoire 46 (2001), Article B46a.
maple: gf := n -> 2/(sqrt((n-1)^2*x^2-2*(n+1)*x+1)+(n-1)*x+1):for n from 0 to 11 do PolynomialTools:-CoefficientList(convert( series(gf(n),x,12),polynom),x) od; # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 17 2014
author: _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 23 2004
